title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Method 1:

1 point is earned for the correct bounds and constant

1 point is earned for the correct integrand

1 point is earned for the correct antidifferentiation and evaluation

Note: 0/1 if integral not of the form ∫ a b [ (f(x)) 2 − (g(x)) 2 ]dx  or  ∫ c d y[ f(y)−g(y) ]dy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaa8qmaeaada WadaqaaiaacIcacaWGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaaiykamaaCaaa leqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTiaacIcacaWGNbGaaiikaiaadIhaca GGPaGaaiykamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaOGaay5waiaaw2faaiaa dsgacaWG4baaleaacaWGHbaabaGaamOyaaqdcqGHRiI8aOGaaeiiai aab+gacaqGYbGaaeiiamaapedabaGaamyEamaadmaabaGaamOzaiaa cIcacaWG5bGaaiykaiabgkHiTiaadEgacaGGOaGaamyEaiaacMcaai aawUfacaGLDbaacaWGKbGaamyEaaWcbaGaam4yaaqaaiaadsgaa0Ga ey4kIipaaaa@5D46@

OR

1 point is earned for the correct bounds and constant

1 point is earned for the correct subtraction of volumes

1 point is earned for the correct answer

π ∫ − 4 0 ( ( 4 + x ) 2 − ( 1 2 x + 2 ) 2 ) d x = π ∫ − 4 0 ( 4 + x − ( 1 4 x 2 + 2 x + 4 ) ) d x = π ( 8 − 16 3 ) = 8 π 3 ≈ 8.378

Method 3:

1 point is earned for the correct bounds and constant

Note: 0/1 if integral not of the form ∫ a b [ (f(x)) 2 − (g(x)) 2 ]dx  or  ∫ c d y[ f(y)−g(y) ]dy MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaa8qmaeaada WadaqaaiaacIcacaWGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaaiykamaaCaaa leqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTiaacIcacaWGNbGaaiikaiaadIhaca GGPaGaaiykamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaOGaay5waiaaw2faaiaa dsgacaWG4baaleaacaWGHbaabaGaamOyaaqdcqGHRiI8aOGaaeiiai aab+gacaqGYbGaaeiiamaapedabaGaamyEamaadmaabaGaamOzaiaa cIcacaWG5bGaaiykaiabgkHiTiaadEgacaGGOaGaamyEaiaacMcaai aawUfacaGLDbaacaWGKbGaamyEaaWcbaGaam4yaaqaaiaadsgaa0Ga ey4kIipaaaa@5D46@

OR

1 point is earned for the correct bounds and constant

1 point is earned for the correct subtraction of volumes

1 point is earned for the correct answer

π ∫ − 4 0 ( 4 + x ) 2 d x = π ( 4 x + x 2 2 ) | − 4 0 = 0 − π ( − 16 + 8 ) = 8 π Volume   of   cone = 1 3 π ( 2 ) 2 ( 4 ) = 16 π 3 Volume = 8 π − 16 π 3 = 8 π 3

Note: In (a), (b), and (c) any arithmetic error results in loss of last point.
